DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine effect RIPC physiological parameter non-valvular paroxysmal atrial fibrillation . Furthermore study provide unique bio-date base analysis molecular genetic mechanism responsible observed result . The potential effect RIPC AF inducibility and/or prothrombotic activity might implement additional treatment component reduce AF burden minimize thromboembolic risk . Interim Analysis do 73 patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Electrophysiological Biomolecular Parameters Non-valvular Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation : RIPPAF Study
DOC.criteria: plan invasive Atrial Fibrillation ablation AF ECG Admission history AF ablation age < 18 pregnancy neoplastic disorder acute systemic inflammation , autoimmune disease document atrial flutter
